name: Michelle St. Fleur
bio: According to Boris Kravitz, owner of the Haitian Art Company, Michelle St. Fleur is from Haiti's Artibonite region. Boris is nearly certain that St. Fleur was a student of Saincilus Ismael.

artworks.title: Village Scene
description: Village Scene was one of 25 Haitian paintings from this collection that were exhibited in the show Life in Bold Colors at Sonoma State University, Sonoma, California in 2007.
